Title: Horror Club
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Kate Micucci, Matthew Moy, Zach Steel
Plot: Steven goes to the lighthouse in Beach City to watch scary movies with Ronaldo, Sadie and Lars. However, something else is with them.
